high_descs: Turn to your left, take a step, turn right, and face the bed
Pick the mat on the left from the bed
Turn left and go to the table with a lamp
anns.task_desc: Take a mat from the bed and turn on the table lamp

high_descs: Make a left and walk to the end of the bed.
Pick up the pillow closest to the foot of the bed.
Make a left and head to the far right side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pillow to look at it under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn left, walk a few steps, then turn right to face the bed.
Pick up the cushion that is closest to the foot of the bed.
Turn around completely, then turn right and walk up to the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the right side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a cushion using the light of a lamp.
